name: Poison Smoke Bomb
effects: Inflict 3 random status effects (Poison, Blind, Sleep, Silence, Paralyze and Confusion 30%) to all enemies

name: Poison Smoke Bomb
猛毒煙霧玉
맹독 연막탄
Fumigène empoisonné
Giftrauchbombe
Bomba de humo tóxico
desc_short: Randomly poison, blind, put to sleep, silence, paralyze, or confuse all enemies
對全體敵人隨機施加異常狀態
적 전체에 무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 부여
Inflige aléatoirement poi., céc., som., sil., para., ou conf. sur tous les ennemis
Fügt zuf. Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Betäubung, Konfus oder Virus hinzu, alle Gegner.
Inflige al azar ven, ceg, sue, sil, par o con a todos los enemigos
desc_long: Randomly poisons, blinds, puts to sleep, silences, paralyzes, or confuses all enemies.
對全體敵人隨機施加異常狀態。
적 전체에 무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 선화를 부여합니다.
Inflige aléatoirement poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, ou confusion à tous les ennemis.
Fügt zuf. Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Betäubung oder Konfus hinzu, alle Gegner.
Inflige al azar veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis o confusión a todos los enemigos.
